name.name: Emory-UNC Developmental Macaque Structural and DTI Atlases

software.description: This is a set of cross-sectional structural atlases as well as cross-sectional and longitudinal DTI atlases of a cohort of 40 rhesus macaques scanned longitudinally at ages 2 weeks, 3 months, 6 months, 12 months, and 18 months.
software.maintainer: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
